name: Create Social Media Caption
objective: Generate a creative and engaging social media caption for an event announcement using AI
description: A streamlined workflow for creating event-based social media captions using Google AI Studio. Utilizes AI model temperature control for creative output and generates multiple caption variants with hashtags for selection.
time_saved: Eliminates 10-15 minutes of manual copywriting and ideation

tasks.description: Specify event name, artist/speaker, date, time, and location in prompt
Set temperature to 0.9 for more creative output
Run the prompt to get multiple caption variants with hashtags
Choose the best option for the social media post and make minor edits if needed

entry_criteria: Event details available (name, date, time, location, artist/speaker)
Understanding of target audience and brand voice
exit_criteria: Caption aligns with brand voice and event tone
best_practices: Include all essential event details in the prompt
Specify desired tone and style (elegant, casual, energetic, etc.)
Set temperature to 0.7-0.9 for creative captions
Review for brand voice alignment before posting
common_pitfalls: Missing critical event details (date, time, location)
Not specifying tone, resulting in generic output
Using temperature too low (<0.5), limiting creativity
Not reviewing for accuracy before posting
integration_with_other_workflows: WRF-003: Can be combined with video generation for event visuals
